name: Sam Sludge: The case of the dirty runoff
name_original: Sam Sludge: The case of the dirty runoff
description:
Armed with your plunger you take on the mysterious creatures living in the sewer in this old school styled first person shooter. Find weapons, ammo packs and med-kits to survive encounters deep below the city, and venture ever deeper into the cisterns and tunnels to solve the case.

LUDUM DARE 48 ENTRY

Control:

  • Move:  wasd
  • Jump: space
  • Interact: 'e'
  • Attack: Mouse 1
  • Menu: Esc
